verbose_text: These phosphorylation events are catalysed by several cellular kinases such as PKC (protein kinase C) which phosphorylates M1 [XREF_BIBR], PB1-F2 [XREF_BIBR], NS1 [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], and PB1 [XREF_BIBR], or by CDKs (cyclin dependent kinases) and ERKs (extracellular signal regulated kinases), which phosphorylate NS1 [XREF_BIBR].
